report: Klinik, Fragestellung, Rechtfertigende Indikation: Aderhautmelanom, pulmonal und zerebral metastasiert, Verlaufskontrolle.  Technik: 1,5-Tesla-MRT des Neurokraniums. Localizer. T2 FLAIR axial, T2 TSE axial, T1 SE axial und sagittal, DWI/ADC axial, SWI axial. Nach i.v. Applikation von 8 ml Gadovist T1 SE axial, T1-MPRAGE.  Befund: Es liegen Voraufnahmen zum Vergleich vor.  Weiter gering größenregrediente randständig schrankengestörte Raumforderung links temporal, aktuell bis 9 x 8 mm messend (Serie 15/63; VU: 12 x 8 mm). Allenfalls nur noch sehr flau abgrenzbare Metastase im medialen hinteren cerebellum (Serie 15/49; VU: 3 x 2 mm). Kein Nachweis einer neuen metastasensuspekten Raumforderung. Größenkonstantes frontales Falxmeningeom bis 30 mm Durchmesser (sehr 15/130). Von links frontal einliegende Ventrikeldrainage mit Spitze im linken Seitenventrikelvorderhorn. Unveränderte Asymmetrie der Seitenventrikel (rechts > links). Kein Liquoraufstau. Keine Mittellinienverlagerung. Keine Herniation. Flächiges Defektareal rechts frontotemporal. Unveränderte Gliosezone links frontal im Bereich des einliegenden Shunts. Keine Blutungs-suspekten Suszebiltätsartefakte. Keine für eine frische Ischämie suspekte Diffusionsrestriktion. Z. n. Hemikraniektomie rechts. Teilverlegte Mastoidzellen beidseits sowie basale Schleimhautschwellung im Sinus maxillaris beidseits. Weiter größenregrediente Weichteilmetastase an der Cutis am linken Mastikatorraum, aktuell bis 7 mm Durchmesser (Serie 15/730; VU: 11 x 8 mm).  Beurteilung: •    Weiter größenregrediente links temporomesiale Metastase sowie allenfalls noch fraglich abgrenzbare zerebelläre Metastase. Kein Nachweis neuer intrakranieller Metastasen. •    Miterfasst Größenregredienz der Weichteilmetastase angrenzend an den Mastikatorraum links. •    Größenkonstantes Falxmeningeom.
translation:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification: Choroidal melanoma with pulmonary and cerebral metastases, follow-up evaluation. 

Technique: 1.5-Tesla MRI of the brain. Localizer. Axial T2 FLAIR, axial T2 TSE, axial and sagittal T1 SE, axial DWI/ADC, axial SWI. Post-contrast administration of 8 ml Gadovist, axial T1 SE, T1-MPRAGE.

Findings: Previous images are available for comparison. There is a further slight reduction in size of the peripheral lesion with blood-brain barrier disruption in the left temporal region, currently measuring up to 9 x 8 mm (Series 15/63; previous: 12 x 8 mm). A cerebellar metastasis in the medial posterior region is now barely discernible (Series 15/49; previous: 3 x 2 mm). No evidence of new suspicious metastatic lesions. A stable-sized frontal falx meningioma measuring up to 30 mm in diameter (Series 15/130). A ventricular drain is present from the left frontal region, with the tip in the anterior horn of the left lateral ventricle. Unchanged asymmetry of the lateral ventricles (right > left). No cerebrospinal fluid accumulation. No midline shift. No herniation. A broad defect area in the right frontotemporal region. Unchanged gliosis zone in the left frontal region near the shunt. No susceptibility artifacts suggestive of bleeding. No diffusion restriction indicative of acute ischemia. Status post right hemicraniectomy. Partially opacified mastoid air cells on both sides and basal mucosal swelling in the maxillary sinuses on both sides. Further reduction in size of the soft tissue metastasis in the skin of the left masticator space, currently up to 7 mm in diameter (Series 15/730; previous: 11 x 8 mm).

Impression:
- Further reduction in size of the left temporomesial metastasis and a cerebellar metastasis that is now barely discernible. No evidence of new intracranial metastases.
- Noted reduction in size of the soft tissue metastasis adjacent to the left masticator space.
- Stable-sized falx meningioma.

report: Klinik, Fragestellung, Rechtfertigende Indikation: Morbus Crohn, Z. n. rektovaginaler Fistel und Gracilisflap links. Verlaufsbildgebung erbeten.  Technik: 1,5-Tesla-MRT des Beckens. Localizer. T1 TSE se axial, T2 TIRM sagittal, T2 TSE axial und koronar. Nach i.v. Applikation von 7 ml Gadovist T1-TSE axial koronar und sagittal.  Befund: Aktuell einliegender Faden in dem bekannten Defekt der Rektumvorderwand ca. 2,5 cm ab ano mit Verlauf über den Gracilisflap unterhalb der Vaginalhinterwand. (Serie 9/36). Regrediente Ödematisierung des linksseitigen Gracilisflaps. Kein Nachweis eines neuen Fistelganges. Minimal freie Flüssigkeit pelvin. Miterfasstes Stoma im rechten Unterbauch. Keine pathologisch distendierten Darmschlingen. Keine vergrößerten Lymphknoten. Unauffällige Darstellung ossären Strukturen.  Beurteilung Weiterhin nicht vollständig ausgranuliert imponierender Defekt der Rektumvorderwand mit Fistelverlauf direkt unterhalb der Vaginalhinterwand bei einliegendem Faden.
translation:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification: Crohn's disease, status post rectovaginal fistula and left gracilis flap. Follow-up imaging requested.

Technique: 1.5-Tesla MRI of the pelvis. Localizer. T1 TSE axial, T2 TIRM sagittal, T2 TSE axial and coronal. Post intravenous administration of 7 ml Gadovist, T1-TSE axial, coronal, and sagittal.

Findings: Currently, there is a suture present in the known defect of the anterior rectal wall approximately 2.5 cm from the anus, extending over the gracilis flap beneath the posterior vaginal wall (Series 9/36). There is regressing edema of the left gracilis flap. No evidence of a new fistulous tract. Minimal free fluid in the pelvis. The stoma in the right lower abdomen is included in the imaging. No pathologically distended bowel loops. No enlarged lymph nodes. The bony structures appear unremarkable.

Impression: The defect in the anterior rectal wall, with the fistulous tract directly beneath the posterior vaginal wall and the presence of a suture, continues to appear not fully granulated.

report: Klinik, Fragestellung, Rechtfertigende Indikation: Metastasiertes Aderhautmelanom. Frage nach Lebermetastasen.  Technik: 3-Tesla-MRT des Oberbauchs. Localizer. T2 Haste koronar axial, T1 Flash IN/OPP axial, T1 Vibe Dixon nativ und zu verschiedenen Zeitpunkten i.v. Applikation von 10 ml Primovist, T1 Vibe Dixon koronar, T2 Haste TSE axial, DWI/ADC axial.  Befund: T1w nativ hyperintense und T2w flau hyperintense Raumforderung mit korrespondierendem Primovistspeicherdefekt direkt subdiaphragmal in Segment 2 mit 23 mm Durchmesser (16/25). Weitere Läsion im Segment 6 mit 15 mm Durchmesser (Serie 16/47). Weitere kleinste Läsionen im oberen Segment 6, 3 mm (Serie 17/31 bzw. 14/67). Drei fokale Signalauslöschungen rechts unter der Zwerchfellkuppel (Serie 13, Bild 10) ohne Korrelat in der DWI. Z. n. CCE. Keine intra- oder extrahepatische Cholestase. Pankreas fettig atrophiert, Ductus schlank. Milz nicht vergrößert, keine fokalen Läsionen. Nebenmilz am ventralen Pol mit 6 mm Durchmesser. Nebennieren beidseits zart. Nieren in orthotoper Lage und seitengleich kontrastiert mit multiplen parapelvinen Nierenzysten beidseits. Keine malignitätssuspekte Raumforderung. Kein Harnstau. Keine pathologisch distendierten Darmschlingen. Keine freie Flüssigkeit. Keine malignitätssuspekt konfigurierten Lymphknoten. Durchgängiges Flusssignal großen Abdominalgefäße. In der basal erfassten Lunge keine größere Konsolidierung. Kein basaler Pleura- oder Perikarderguss. Keine ossären Destruktionen. Mehrere intraspongiöse Bandscheibenherniationen.  Beurteilung: •    Nachweis dreier Lebermetastasen: in Segment 2 mit 30 mm Durchmessers sowie in Segment 6 mit 3 bzw. 15 mm Durchmesser. •    Darüber hinaus keine Lymphknoten oder Fernmetastasen im Oberbauch.
translation:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification for Examination: Metastatic choroidal melanoma. Query regarding liver metastases.

Technique: 3-Tesla MRI of the upper abdomen. Localizer. T2 Haste coronal axial, T1 Flash IN/OPP axial, T1 Vibe Dixon native and at various time points post i.v. administration of 10 ml Primovist, T1 Vibe Dixon coronal, T2 Haste TSE axial, DWI/ADC axial.

Findings: A T1-weighted native hyperintense and T2-weighted mildly hyperintense mass with a corresponding Primovist uptake defect is located directly subdiaphragmatically in segment 2, measuring 23 mm in diameter (16/25). Another lesion in segment 6 measures 15 mm in diameter (series 16/47). Additional tiny lesions in the upper segment 6, measuring 3 mm (series 17/31 and 14/67). Three focal signal voids are noted on the right under the diaphragm dome (series 13, image 10) without correlation in DWI. Status post CCE. No intra- or extrahepatic cholestasis. The pancreas is fatty and atrophied, with a slender duct. The spleen is not enlarged, with no focal lesions. An accessory spleen is present at the ventral pole, measuring 6 mm in diameter. Adrenal glands are delicate on both sides. Kidneys are in orthotopic position and symmetrically enhanced with multiple parapelvic renal cysts on both sides. No space-occupying lesions suspicious for malignancy. No urinary obstruction. No pathologically distended bowel loops. No free fluid. No lymph nodes suspicious for malignancy. Continuous flow signal in major abdominal vessels. In the lung bases, no significant consolidation. No basal pleural or pericardial effusion. No osseous destruction. Several intraspongious disc herniations.

Conclusion:
- Evidence of three liver metastases: in segment 2 measuring 30 mm in diameter, and in segment 6 measuring 3 mm and 15 mm in diameter.
- No lymph node involvement or distant metastases in the upper abdomen.

T2 Haste koronar axial, T1 Flash IN/OPP axial, T1 Vibe Dixon nativ und zu verschiedenen Zeitpunkten i.v. Applikation von 10 ml Primovist, T1 Vibe Dixon koronar, T2 Haste TSE axial, DWI/ADC axial. Befund: T1w nativ hyperintense und T2w flau hyperintense Raumforderung mit korrespondierendem Primovistspeicherdefekt direkt subdiaphragmal in Segment 2 mit 23 mm Durchmesser (16/25). Weitere Läsion im Segment 6 mit 15 mm Durchmesser (Serie 16/47). Weitere kleinste Läsionen im oberen Segment 6, 3 mm (Serie 17/31 bzw. 14/67). Drei fokale Signalauslöschungen rechts unter der Zwerchfellkuppel (Serie 13, Bild 10) ohne Korrelat in der DWI. Z. n. CCE. Keine intra- oder extrahepatische Cholestase. Pankreas fettig atrophiert, Ductus schlank. Milz nicht vergrößert, keine fokalen Läsionen. Nebenmilz am ventralen Pol mit 6 mm Durchmesser. Nebennieren beidseits zart. Nieren in orthotoper Lage und seitengleich kontrastiert mit multiplen parapelvinen Nierenzysten beidseits. Keine malignitätssuspekte Raumforderung. Kein Harnstau. Keine pathologisch distendierten Darmschlingen. Keine freie Flüssigkeit. Keine malignitätssuspekt konfigurierten Lymphknoten. Durchgängiges Flusssignal großen Abdominalgefäße. In der basal erfassten Lunge keine größere Konsolidierung. Kein basaler Pleura- oder Perikarderguss. Keine ossären Destruktionen. Mehrere intraspongiöse Bandscheibenherniationen. Beurteilung: •    Nachweis dreier Lebermetastasen: in Segment 2 mit 30 mm Durchmesser sowie in Segment 6 mit 3 bzw. 15 mm Durchmesser. •    Darüber hinaus keine Lymphknoten oder Fernmetastasen im Oberbauch.
translation_proofread:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification for Examination: Metastatic choroidal melanoma. Query regarding liver metastases.

Technique: 3-Tesla MRI of the upper abdomen. Localizer. T2 Haste coronal axial, T1 Flash IN/OPP axial, T1 Vibe Dixon native and at various time points post i.v. administration of 10 ml Primovist, T1 Vibe Dixon coronal, T2 Haste TSE axial, DWI/ADC axial.

Findings: A T1-weighted native hyperintense and T2-weighted mildly hyperintense mass with a corresponding Primovist uptake defect is located directly subdiaphragmatically in segment 2, measuring 23 mm in diameter (16/25). Another lesion in segment 6 measures 15 mm in diameter (series 16/47). Additional tiny lesions in the upper segment 6, measuring 3 mm (series 17/31 and 14/67). Three focal signal voids are noted on the right under the diaphragm dome (series 13, image 10) without correlation in DWI. Status post CCE. No intra- or extrahepatic cholestasis. The pancreas is fatty and atrophied, with a slender duct. The spleen is not enlarged, with no focal lesions. An accessory spleen is present at the ventral pole, measuring 6 mm in diameter. Adrenal glands are delicate on both sides. Kidneys are in orthotopic position and symmetrically enhanced with multiple parapelvic renal cysts on both sides. No space-occupying lesions suspicious for malignancy. No urinary obstruction. No pathologically distended bowel loops. No free fluid. No lymph nodes suspicious for malignancy. Continuous flow signal in major abdominal vessels. In the lung bases, no significant consolidation. No basal pleural or pericardial effusion. No osseous destruction. Several intraspongious disc herniations.

Conclusion:
- Evidence of three liver metastases: in segment 2 measuring 23 mm in diameter, and in segment 6 measuring 3 mm and 15 mm in diameter.
- No lymph node involvement or distant metastases in the upper abdomen.

report: Klinik, Fragestellung, rechtfertigende Indikation: Schwindel unklarer Genese. Frage nach strukturellem Korrelat.  Technik: 3-Tesla-MRT des Neurokraniums. Localizer. T2 TSE fs axial, T1 flash axial, SWI axial, DWI/ADC axial, T2 TIRM koronar, T1-MPRAGE.  Befund: Keine Voraufnahmen.  Das altermaß überschreitende frontotemporal betonte Hirnvolumenminderung. Seitenventrikel schlank und symmetrisch, vierter Ventrikel frei entfaltet. Keine Mittelinienverlagerung. Keine Herniation. Regelrechte Signalgebung des Kortexbandes, der Basalganglien, des Kleinhirns und des Hirnstammes. Keine Blutungs-suspekten Suszebiltätsartefakte. Keine für eine frische Ischämie suspekte Diffusionsrestriktion. Unauffällige Signalgebung der Schädelkalotte und Schädelbasis. Polypöse Schleimhautschwellung des basalen Sinus maxillaris links, einzelne verlegte Mastoidzellen.  Beurteilung: •    Kein strukturelles Korrelat für die Symptomatik. •    Das Altersmaß überschreitende Hirnvolumenminderung.
translation:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification: Dizziness of unclear origin. Query regarding structural correlation. 

Technique: 3-Tesla MRI of the neurocranium. Localizer. T2 TSE fs axial, T1 flash axial, SWI axial, DWI/ADC axial, T2 TIRM coronal, T1-MPRAGE.

Findings: No prior images available. There is a reduction in brain volume, exceeding what is expected for age, with a frontotemporal emphasis. The lateral ventricles are narrow and symmetrical, and the fourth ventricle is fully developed. No midline shift. No herniation. Normal signal characteristics of the cortical ribbon, basal ganglia, cerebellum, and brainstem. No susceptibility artifacts suggestive of bleeding. No diffusion restriction indicative of acute ischemia. Normal signal characteristics of the skull cap and skull base. Polypoid mucosal swelling of the left basal maxillary sinus, with some occluded mastoid cells.

Impression:
• No structural correlate for the symptoms.
• Brain volume reduction exceeding age expectations.

report: Klinik, Fragestellung, Rechtfertigende Indikation: Bekannter Crohn, Schmerzen rechts. Entzündung? Stenose?  Technik: Orale Gabe von 250 ml Osmofundin, i.v. Gave von 2 ml Buscopan. 1,5-Tesla-MRT Abdomen folgenden Sequenzen: Localizer. T2 Haste axial, T1 Flash opp/inn axial, T2 Haste koronar, T2 Haste sagittal, T2 Haste fs koronar, nach i.v. Gabe von 8 ml Gadovist T1 vibe fs koronar dynamische Sequenzen, T1 Flash fs axial, T1 Flash fs koronar, T2 Haste fs koronar, T2 TRUFI koronar.  Befund:  Ca. 7 cm lange vorbekannte Wandverdickung des terminalen Ileums (Serie 7, Image 45-48) ohne Signalsteigerung nach KM-Gabe, keine Ödematisierung in den fettgesättigten T2w-Sequenzen. 4 cm oral davon Wandverdickung des Ileums über 2 cm Länge, weiterhin 3 cm oral über 1 cm lange Wandverdickung des Ileums (Serie 7, Image 51), ebenso ohne Ödematisierung in den fettgesättigten T2w-Sequenzen, keine Signalsteigerung post-KM. Keine pathologisch distendierten Darmschlingen. Keine pathologisch vergrößerten Lymphknoten. Geringe Menge freier Flüssigkeit pelvin, im physiologischen Rahmen. Normal große, glatt berandete Leber, vorbekannte zystoide Läsion im Segment 4b. Keine Erweiterung der intrahepatischen oder extrahepatischen Gallengänge. Normale Lobulierung des Pankreasparenchyms ohne Aufstau des Ductus pancreaticus. Normal große Milz mit homogenem Parenchym, vorbekannte 3 Nebenmilz. Schmale Nebennieren beidseits. Normal große, orthotop gelegene Nieren beidseits, kein Harnstau. Wenig flüssigkeitsgefüllte Harnblase ohne Wandunregelmäßigkeiten. Anteflektierter Uterus. Bekannte Ovula Nabothi der Zervix. Kein flächiges Infiltrat der basalen Lunge. Kein basaler Pleuraerguss oder Perikarderguss. Keine pathologische Signalgebung der mitabgebildeten ossären Strukturen. Vorbekannte geringe Ventrolisthesis von LWK 4, Meyerding Grad I.  Beurteilung: Keine floride Entzündung. Chronisch-entzündliche Wandveränderungen des terminalen Ileums (ca. 7 cm) mit zwei kurzstreckigen (ebenfalls chronischen) „skip-lesions“ im vorgeschalteten Ileum. Keine pathologische Erweiterung der Darmschlingen.
translation:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification: Known Crohn's disease, right-sided pain. Inflammation? Stenosis? 

Technique: Oral administration of 250 ml Osmofundin, intravenous administration of 2 ml Buscopan. 1.5-Tesla MRI of the abdomen with the following sequences: Localizer. Axial T2 Haste, Axial T1 Flash opp/in, Coronal T2 Haste, Sagittal T2 Haste, Coronal T2 Haste fat-saturated, post-contrast administration of 8 ml Gadovist T1 vibe fat-saturated coronal dynamic sequences, Axial T1 Flash fat-saturated, Coronal T1 Flash fat-saturated, Coronal T2 Haste fat-saturated, Coronal T2 TRUFI.

Findings: Approximately 7 cm long previously known wall thickening of the terminal ileum (Series 7, Images 45-48) without signal enhancement after contrast administration, no edema in the fat-saturated T2-weighted sequences. 4 cm proximally, there is a 2 cm long wall thickening of the ileum, and further 3 cm proximally, a 1 cm long wall thickening of the ileum (Series 7, Image 51), also without edema in the fat-saturated T2-weighted sequences, no post-contrast signal enhancement. No pathologically distended bowel loops. No pathologically enlarged lymph nodes. Small amount of free fluid in the pelvis, within physiological limits. Normal-sized, smoothly contoured liver, previously known cystic lesion in segment 4b. No dilation of intrahepatic or extrahepatic bile ducts. Normal lobulation of the pancreatic parenchyma without dilation of the pancreatic duct. Normal-sized spleen with homogeneous parenchyma, previously known 3 accessory spleens. Narrow adrenal glands on both sides. Normal-sized, orthotopically located kidneys on both sides, no urinary obstruction. Slightly fluid-filled bladder without wall irregularities. Anteverted uterus. Known Nabothian cysts of the cervix. No diffuse infiltrate in the basal lung. No basal pleural effusion or pericardial effusion. No pathological signal from the included osseous structures. Previously known slight ventrolisthesis of L4, Meyerding Grade I.

Conclusion: No active inflammation. Chronic inflammatory wall changes of the terminal ileum (approximately 7 cm) with two short-segment (also chronic) "skip lesions" in the proximal ileum. No pathological dilation of the bowel loops.

report:
Klinik, Fragestellung, rechtfertigende Indikation:
NMDA Rezeptorenzephalitis, niedriggradiges Gliom, MYB/MYBL1, Tumorteilresektion. Tumorprogress?

MRT des Neurokraniums bei 3 Tesla. Rückenlage. Kopfspule. Sequenzen: Lokalisationssequenzen in mehreren Raumebenen, T2 TSE FS axial, T1 FLASH axial, T2 TSE sagittal, T2-FLAIR coronar, EPI DWI axial, T2* axial, T1 MPRAGE sagittal nach Applikation von 2,7 ml Gadovist. 

Befund:
Bekannter Tumor im rechts zerebellären Marklager mit Infiltration des superioren Kortex, der oberen und mittleren zerebellären Pedunkel sowie den inferioren Anteil des Vermis. Die Größe ist unverändert, der Tumor wirkt jedoch insbesondere verglichen mit dem 27.09.2021 etwas weniger voluminös. Unveränderte kleine Resektionshöhle zentral in der Läsion. Kein Enhancement, keine Diffusionsrestriktionen. Diskrete postoperative Hämosiderinablagerungen.
Keine Leukenzephalopathie, keine Atrophie, kein Hinweis für eine Liquorzirkulationsstörung, altersgerecht kleine Hypophyse, keine Mikroblutungen/Karvernome.
Freie Nasennebenhöhlen, Mastoidzellen und Cava tympani.

Beurteilung:
SD bei jedoch insgesamt leicht weniger voluminös erscheinendem Tumor
translation:
Clinical Information, Question, Justification for Examination:
NMDA receptor encephalitis, low-grade glioma, MYB/MYBL1, partial tumor resection. Tumor progression?

MRI of the brain at 3 Tesla. Supine position. Head coil. Sequences: Localization sequences in multiple planes, T2 TSE FS axial, T1 FLASH axial, T2 TSE sagittal, T2-FLAIR coronal, EPI DWI axial, T2* axial, T1 MPRAGE sagittal after administration of 2.7 ml Gadovist.

Findings:
Known tumor in the right cerebellar white matter with infiltration of the superior cortex, the superior and middle cerebellar peduncles, as well as the inferior portion of the vermis. The size is unchanged, but the tumor appears slightly less voluminous compared to the examination on 09/27/2021. Unchanged small resection cavity centrally within the lesion. No enhancement, no diffusion restrictions. Subtle postoperative hemosiderin deposits. 
No leukoencephalopathy, no atrophy, no evidence of cerebrospinal fluid circulation disorder, age-appropriate small pituitary gland, no microbleeds/cavernomas. 
Clear paranasal sinuses, mastoid cells, and tympanic cavities.

Impression:
Stable disease with an overall slightly less voluminous appearance of the tumor.

report: Esiti di occlusione della vena centrale della retina con anastomosi venovenose a livello del disco ottico. Presenza di aree ischemiche retiniche nei quattro quadranti (superiore, nasale, inferiore, temporale). Aumento della permeabilità vasale al polo posteriore da edema maculare. Conclusioni: esiti di occlusione della vena centrale della retina. Si consiglia laser terapia retinica nei quattro quadranti e successivo impianto intravitreale di corticosteroidi.
translation: Findings consistent with central retinal vein occlusion with venous-venous anastomoses at the optic disc. Presence of retinal ischemic areas in all four quadrants (superior, nasal, inferior, temporal). Increased vascular permeability at the posterior pole due to macular edema. Conclusions: findings consistent with central retinal vein occlusion. Retinal laser therapy is recommended in all four quadrants, followed by intravitreal corticosteroid implantation.

report: L’esame fluorangiografico evidenzia la presenza di una retinopatia diabetica proliferante in entrambi gli occhi con neovasi al disco ottico e solo nell’occhio sinistro con neovasi retinici nei settori superiore, nasale ed inferiore. Si evidenziano aree di non perfusione retinica in media ed estrema periferia retinica in tutti i settori di entrambi gli occhi. Sono presenti esiti di fotocoagulazione laser in estrema periferia retinica nel settore nasale di entrambi gli occhi. Diffuso aumento della permeabilità vasale al polo posteriore e leakage petaloide da edema maculare cistoide. Conclusioni: retinopatia diabetica proliferante grave con edema maculare cistoide. Si consiglia di eseguire panretinica laser e trattamento con antiVEGF in entrambi gli occhi.
translation: The fluorescein angiography reveals the presence of proliferative diabetic retinopathy in both eyes, with neovascularization at the optic disc and, in the left eye only, retinal neovascularization in the superior, nasal, and inferior quadrants. There are areas of retinal non-perfusion in the mid and far periphery across all quadrants of both eyes. Evidence of laser photocoagulation is noted in the far peripheral nasal quadrant of both eyes. There is a widespread increase in vascular permeability at the posterior pole and petaloid leakage due to cystoid macular edema. Conclusions: severe proliferative diabetic retinopathy with cystoid macular edema. It is recommended to perform panretinal laser photocoagulation and anti-VEGF treatment in both eyes.

report: Esame eseguito con strategia 30 – 2 – ZETA. 1° esame computerizzato. In OD emianopsia destra associata a quadranopsia nasale inferiore nettamente delimitata rispetto al piano orizzontale e al settore nasale superiore con risparmio dell’area centrale in tutti i settori. Fovea 31 dB; MD - 21.28 dB; PSD 13.23 dB.La macchia cieca è inglobata nell’emianopsia temporale. In OS campo visivo assente in tutti i settori. Gli indici di attendibilità dell’esame sono accettabili. Conclusioni: Lesione chiasmatica anteriore e pre-chiasmatica interessante anche il nervo ottico dell’OS e parte di quello dell’OD. Si consiglia di effettuare RM dell’encefalo e dell’ipofisi con mezzo di contrasto.
translation: Exam performed using the 30 – 2 – ZETA strategy. First computerized exam. In the right eye (OD), there is right hemianopia associated with a clearly defined lower nasal quadrantanopia relative to the horizontal plane and the upper nasal sector, with sparing of the central area in all sectors. Fovea 31 dB; MD -21.28 dB; PSD 13.23 dB. The blind spot is encompassed within the temporal hemianopia. In the left eye (OS), the visual field is absent in all sectors. The reliability indices of the exam are acceptable. Conclusions: Anterior chiasmal and pre-chiasmal lesion affecting the optic nerve of the left eye (OS) and part of the right eye (OD). A brain and pituitary MRI with contrast is recommended.

report: Esame eseguito con strategia 30 – 2 – ZETA. 2° esame computerizzato. In OD la sensibilità retinica risulta ampiamente ridotta soprattutto nella fascia a cavallo dei settori superiori ed inferiori, sia temporali che nasali, a partenza dalla macchia cieca che risulta inglobata nell'ampio scotoma centrale (scotoma superiore di Bjerrum).Fovea -1 dB; MD -10.97 dB; PSD 11.22 dB. La mappa della Total deviation e quella della Pattern deviation presentano profonda alterazione della sensibilità retinica nei settori superiori, mentre è in parte recuperata la sensibilità nei settori inferiori, rispetto all'esame precedente. GHT oltre i limiti della norma. In OS la sensibilità retinica risulta complessivamente nei limiti della norma pur presentandosi delle piccole aree di riduzione in periferia, oltre i 20°, nel settore nasale superiore ed in quello temporale inferiore. La macchia cieca è di dimensioni normali. Fovea 37 dB; MD 1.61 dB; PSD 2.96 dB La mappa della Total deviation è normale, mentre quella della Pattern deviation presenta alcuni punti di riduzione della sensibilità nei settori inferiori. GHT entro i limiti della norma. Gli indici di attendibilità dell’esame sono scarsi in OO. Conclusioni: Il tracciato presenta ampia alterazione della sensibilità retinica in OD ed una condizione ai limiti della norma in OS.
translation: Exam performed using the 30 – 2 – ZETA strategy. This is the second computerized test. In the right eye (OD), retinal sensitivity is significantly reduced, particularly across the upper and lower sectors, both temporal and nasal, starting from the blind spot, which is encompassed within the large central scotoma (superior Bjerrum scotoma). Fovea -1 dB; MD -10.97 dB; PSD 11.22 dB. The Total Deviation and Pattern Deviation maps show a profound reduction in retinal sensitivity in the upper sectors, while there is partial recovery of sensitivity in the lower sectors compared to the previous exam. GHT is beyond normal limits. In the left eye (OS), retinal sensitivity is generally within normal limits, although there are small areas of reduction in the periphery, beyond 20°, in the upper nasal and lower temporal sectors. The blind spot is of normal size. Fovea 37 dB; MD 1.61 dB; PSD 2.96 dB. The Total Deviation map is normal, while the Pattern Deviation map shows some points of reduced sensitivity in the lower sectors. GHT is within normal limits. The reliability indices of the exam are poor in both eyes (OO). Conclusions: The trace shows a significant alteration in retinal sensitivity in the right eye and a condition at the limits of normal in the left eye.

report: L’esame effettuato mediante scansioni lineari radiali passanti per la fovea (Radial) e ricostruzione in 3D (Retina Map) ha evidenziato: In OD presenza di pucker maculare che si mostra nelle scansioni esaminate come una linea ipereflettente lungo il profilo interno della retina associato a fenomeni di trazione sulla retina e la formazione di foro maculare stadio 1-2 con presenza di evidente pseudocisti foveale. Lieve edema degli strati interni. Evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina ed in particolare la MLE e l’ellissoide, che presenta una interruzione superiormente alla fovea in corrispondenza di una piccola area con dispersione di pigmento. Altra area di dispersione di pigmento è posta nasalmente alla fovea stessa. Assenza di fluidi anomali. Lo spessore retinico dell'area foveale risulta moderatamente aumentato in fovea (OD pari a 331μ). Il volume del cubo esaminato è pari a 10,3 mm3. Conclusioni: Pucker maculare in OD associato a foro maculare stadio 1-2. Dispersione di pigmento in alcune aree maculari. In OS esame nell’ambito della norma.
translation: The examination conducted using radial linear scans through the fovea (Radial) and 3D reconstruction (Retina Map) revealed: In the right eye (OD), the presence of a macular pucker, which appears in the examined scans as a hyper-reflective line along the inner profile of the retina, associated with traction phenomena on the retina and the formation of a stage 1-2 macular hole with an evident foveal pseudocyst. There is mild edema of the inner layers. The different layers of the retina are distinguishable, particularly the external limiting membrane (ELM) and the ellipsoid zone, which shows a disruption above the fovea corresponding to a small area with pigment dispersion. Another area of pigment dispersion is located nasally to the fovea itself. No abnormal fluids are present. The retinal thickness in the foveal area is moderately increased at the fovea (OD measuring 331μ). The volume of the examined cube is 10.3 mm3. Conclusions: Macular pucker in the right eye (OD) associated with a stage 1-2 macular hole. Pigment dispersion in some macular areas. Examination of the left eye (OS) is within normal limits.
report_proofread: L’esame effettuato mediante scansioni lineari radiali passanti per la fovea (Radial) e ricostruzione in 3D (Retina Map) ha evidenziato: In OD presenza di pucker maculare che si mostra nelle scansioni esaminate come una linea ipereflettente lungo il profilo interno della retina associato a fenomeni di trazione sulla retina e la formazione di foro maculare stadio 1-2 con presenza di evidente pseudocisti foveale. Lieve edema degli strati interni. Evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina ed in particolare la MLE e l’ellissoide, che presenta una interruzione superiormente alla fovea in corrispondenza di una piccola area con dispersione di pigmento. Altra area di dispersione di pigmento è posta nasalmente alla fovea stessa. Assenza di fluidi anomali. Lo spessore retinico dell'area foveale risulta moderatamente aumentato in fovea (OD pari a 331μ). Il volume del cubo esaminato è pari a 10,3 mm3. Conclusioni: Pucker maculare in OD associato a foro maculare stadio 1-2. Dispersione di pigmento in alcune aree maculari. In OS esame nell’ambito della norma.
translation_proofread: The examination conducted using radial linear scans through the fovea (Radial) and 3D reconstruction (Retina Map) revealed: In the right eye (OD), the presence of a macular pucker, which appears in the examined scans as a hyper-reflective line along the inner profile of the retina, associated with traction phenomena on the retina and the formation of a stage 1-2 macular hole with an evident foveal pseudocyst. There is mild edema of the inner layers. The different layers of the retina are distinguishable, particularly the external limiting membrane (ELM) and the ellipsoid zone, which shows a disruption above the fovea corresponding to a small area with pigment dispersion. Another area of pigment dispersion is located nasally to the fovea itself. No abnormal fluids are present. The retinal thickness in the foveal area is moderately increased at the fovea (OD measuring 331μ). The volume of the examined cube is 10.3 mm³. Conclusions: Macular pucker in the right eye (OD) associated with a stage 1-2 macular hole. Pigment dispersion in some macular areas. Examination of the left eye (OS) is within normal limits.

report: L’esame effettuato mediante scansioni lineari parallele (High Definition Images 5 Line Raster ) passanti per l’area maculare e ricostruzione in 3D (Macular Cube 512x128), ha evidenziato: In OD presenza di punti di bassa reflettività pre-retinici indice di disomogeneità del vitreo e di una zona pre-retinica otticamente vuota dovuta a retrazione del vitreo (vitreoschisi). Il profilo interno della retina presenta la fisiologica depressione foveale ed appare regolare tranne che in un’area extramaculare corrispondente al fascio papillo-maculare dove è presente una convessità dovuta a distacco sieroso del neuroepitelio (CSCR). Ben evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina ed in particolare la MLE e la giunzione segmento interno/segmento esterno dei fotorecettori. Lo strato EPR-coriocapillare è di aspetto e reflettività normali. Spessore medio del campo centrale = 269 µ, volume del cubo esaminato = 11,2 mm3. In OS punti di bassa reflettività pre-retinici indice di disomogeneità del vitreo e di una zona pre-retinica otticamente vuota dovuta a retrazione del vitreo (vitreoschisi). Il profilo interno della retina, pur mostrando la fisiologica depressione foveale, presenta una marcata convessità conseguenza dell’ampio distacco sieroso del neuroepitelio (CSCR) che impegna la macula ed un’ampia area temporalmente ad essa. In corrispondenza delle stesse aree si nota edema intraretinico diffuso interessante tutti gli strati retinici. Ben evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina ed in particolare la MLE e la giunzione segmento interno/segmento esterno dei fotorecettori (o ellissoide). Spessore medio del campo centrale = 493 µ, volume del cubo esaminato = 14,3 mm3. Conclusioni: in OD corioretinopatia sierosa extramaculare. In OS corioretinopatiasierosa centrale (CSCR) di ampie proporzioni.
translation:
The examination conducted using parallel linear scans (High Definition Images 5 Line Raster) through the macular area and 3D reconstruction (Macular Cube 512x128) revealed the following:

In the right eye (OD), there are areas of low reflectivity in the pre-retinal space, indicating vitreous heterogeneity and an optically empty pre-retinal zone due to vitreous retraction (vitreoschisis). The internal retinal profile shows the physiological foveal depression and appears regular except in an extramacular area corresponding to the papillomacular bundle, where there is a convexity due to serous detachment of the neuroepithelium (CSCR). The various retinal layers are well-defined, particularly the external limiting membrane (ELM) and the inner segment/outer segment junction of the photoreceptors. The RPE-choriocapillaris layer appears normal in aspect and reflectivity. The average central field thickness is 269 µm, and the volume of the examined cube is 11.2 mm³.

In the left eye (OS), there are areas of low reflectivity in the pre-retinal space, indicating vitreous heterogeneity and an optically empty pre-retinal zone due to vitreous retraction (vitreoschisis). The internal retinal profile, while showing the physiological foveal depression, presents a marked convexity as a result of a large serous detachment of the neuroepithelium (CSCR) involving the macula and a large temporal area adjacent to it. In these same areas, there is diffuse intraretinal edema affecting all retinal layers. The various retinal layers are well-defined, particularly the ELM and the inner segment/outer segment junction of the photoreceptors (or ellipsoid). The average central field thickness is 493 µm, and the volume of the examined cube is 14.3 mm³.

Conclusions: In the right eye (OD), there is extramacular serous chorioretinopathy. In the left eye (OS), there is a large central serous chorioretinopathy (CSCR).

report: L’esame effettuato mediante scansioni lineari radiali passanti per la fovea (Radial) e ricostruzione in 3D (Retina Map) -ha evidenziato: In OD il profilo interno della retina appare regolare nelle scansioni effettuate con normale presenza della depressione foveale. Ben evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina diversamente da quelli interni che mostrano irregolarità e appaiono associati a DEP di natura drusenoide e vascolare. Quadro compatibile con la presenza di strie angioidi. Lo strato EPR-coriocapillare è di aspetto e reflettività ridotte rispetto la norma con migrazione di pigmento. Lo spessore retinico medio ed il volume delle aree esaminate sono nella norma, ad eccezione del settore superiore. Spessore medio del campo centrale = 246 μ. In OS il profilo interno della retina appare regolare nelle scansioni effettuate con normale presenza della depressione foveale. Ben evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina diversamente da quelli interni che mostrano irregolarità e appaiono associati a migrazioni di pigmento multiple. Spessore medio del campo centrale = 240 μ. L’esame Angiography Analysis: Angiography 6x6 mm (HD Angio Retina) ha evidenziato: In OD si evidenzia neovascolarizzazioni peripapillari non associate a segnali di attività. In OS assenza di alterazioni vascolari. Conclusioni: In OO strie angiodi associate a pseudoxantoma elastico.
translation: The examination conducted using radial linear scans through the fovea (Radial) and 3D reconstruction (Retina Map) revealed the following: In the right eye (OD), the internal retinal profile appears regular in the scans performed, with a normal presence of the foveal depression. The various retinal layers are well-defined, unlike the inner layers, which show irregularities and appear associated with drusenoid and vascular pigment epithelial detachments (DEP). This is consistent with the presence of angioid streaks. The RPE-choriocapillaris layer shows reduced appearance and reflectivity compared to normal, with pigment migration. The average retinal thickness and volume of the examined areas are within normal limits, except for the superior sector. Average central field thickness = 246 μm. In the left eye (OS), the internal retinal profile appears regular in the scans performed, with a normal presence of the foveal depression. The various retinal layers are well-defined, unlike the inner layers, which show irregularities and appear associated with multiple pigment migrations. Average central field thickness = 240 μm. The Angiography Analysis: Angiography 6x6 mm (HD Angio Retina) revealed: In the right eye (OD), peripapillary neovascularizations are evident, not associated with signs of activity. In the left eye (OS), there are no vascular alterations. Conclusions: In both eyes (OU), angioid streaks associated with pseudoxanthoma elasticum.

report: L’esame effettuato mediante scansioni lineari radiali passanti per la fovea (Radial) e ricostruzione in 3D (Retina Map)- ha evidenziato: Esame sostanzialmente simile al precedente effettuato 10 mesi prima, pertanto: in ambo gli occhi (OD < OS) si evidenzia la presenza di pucker maculare che si mostra nelle scansioni esaminate come una linea ipereflettente lungo il profilo interno della retina associato a fenomeni di trazione che determinano delle pieghe della retina stessa ed edema dello strato nucleare esterno. Sono presenti alcune pseudocisti in deep retina, non evidenziate in passato. Depressione foveale appena individuabile in OD, assente in OS. Evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina ed in particolare la MLE e l’ellissoide. Lo spessore retinico dell'area maculare (fovea in OD pari a 338 micron, in OS 399 micron) è aumentato rispetto alla norma. Il volume del cubo esaminato è pari a 7,72 mm3 in OD e 7,79 mm3 in OS). Conclusioni: Pucker maculare bilaterale di proporzioni stabili in OD e moderatamente peggiorate in OS. Si consiglia la ripetizione dell’esame tra 8 mesi.
translation: The examination, conducted using radial linear scans through the fovea (Radial) and 3D reconstruction (Retina Map), revealed the following: The findings are essentially similar to the previous exam conducted 10 months ago. In both eyes (right eye less than left eye), there is evidence of a macular pucker, which appears in the scans as a hyper-reflective line along the inner profile of the retina, associated with traction phenomena causing folds in the retina itself and edema of the outer nuclear layer. Some pseudocysts are present in the deep retina, which were not noted previously. The foveal depression is barely detectable in the right eye and absent in the left eye. The different layers of the retina are distinguishable, particularly the external limiting membrane and the ellipsoid zone. The retinal thickness in the macular area (fovea in the right eye is 338 microns, in the left eye 399 microns) is increased compared to normal. The volume of the examined cube is 7.72 mm³ in the right eye and 7.79 mm³ in the left eye. Conclusions: Bilateral macular pucker with stable proportions in the right eye and moderately worsened in the left eye. A follow-up examination is recommended in 8 months.

Evidenziabili i diversi strati della retina ed in particolare la MLE e l’ellissoide. Lo spessore retinico dell'area maculare (fovea in OD pari a 338 micron, in OS 399 micron) è aumentato rispetto alla norma. Il volume del cubo esaminato è pari a 7,72 mm3 in OD e 7,79 mm3 in OS. Conclusioni: Pucker maculare bilaterale di proporzioni stabili in OD e moderatamente peggiorate in OS. Si consiglia la ripetizione dell’esame tra 8 mesi.
translation_with_error: The examination, conducted using radial linear scans through the fovea (Radial) and 3D reconstruction (Retina Map), revealed the following: The findings are essentially similar to the previous exam conducted 10 months ago. In both eyes (right eye less than left eye), there is no evidence of a macular pucker, which appears in the scans as a hyper-reflective line along the inner profile of the retina, associated with traction phenomena causing folds in the retina itself and edema of the outer nuclear layer. Some pseudocysts are present in the deep retina, which were not noted previously. The foveal depression is barely detectable in the right eye and absent in the left eye. The different layers of the retina are distinguishable, particularly the external limiting membrane and the ellipsoid zone. The retinal thickness in the macular area (fovea in the right eye is 338 microns, in the left eye 399 microns) is increased compared to normal. The volume of the examined cube is 7.72 mm³ in the right eye and 7.79 mm³ in the left eye. Conclusions: Bilateral macular pucker with stable proportions in the right eye and moderately worsened in the left eye. A follow-up examination is recommended in 8 months.

report: OD: Al polo posteriore, sono presenti aree iperfluorescenti che aumentano di intensità e dimensioni nel tempo. L’esame ICG e OCTA evidenziano una neovascolarizzazione sottoretinica. L’esame OCTmostra segni di attività della neovascolarizzazione sottoretinica. OS: Assenza di anomalie angiografiche al polo posteriore. L’esame OCTmostra conservato profilo e spessore maculare. L’esame OCTRNFL mostra lieve riduzione dello spessore dello strato delle fibre nervose nel quadrante temporale inferiore in OD e appare nella norma in OS. Conclusioni: OD: neovascolarizzazione sottoretinica attiva. Si consiglia iniezione intravitreale di anti-VEGF in OD.
translation: Right Eye (OD): In the posterior pole, there are hyperfluorescent areas that increase in intensity and size over time. The ICG and OCTA exams reveal subretinal neovascularization. The OCTexam shows signs of activity in the subretinal neovascularization. Left Eye (OS): No angiographic abnormalities are present in the posterior pole. The OCTexam shows a preserved macular profile and thickness. The OCTRNFL exam shows a slight reduction in the thickness of the nerve fiber layer in the lower temporal quadrant of the right eye (OD) and appears normal in the left eye (OS). Conclusions: Right Eye (OD): Active subretinal neovascularization. An intravitreal injection of anti-VEGF is recommended for the right eye (OD).

report: OO: Strie angioidi. OD: In regione maculare sono presenti aree irregolari ipo-iperfluorescenti che non aumentano di intensita’ nel tempo per alterazione dell’epitelio pigmentato retinico. L’esame ICG mostra numerose aree ipofluorescenti al polo posteriore con aspetto a “peau  d’orange” ed al polo posteriore nel settore temporale è presente un’area ipocianescente che non si modifica nel tempo da nevo della coroide, confermato anche da scansioni OCT. L’esame OCTevidenzia piccola falda di fluido sottoretinico sottoretinico in regione subfoveale. OS: In regione maculare sono presenti aree irregolari ipo-iperfluorescente che non aumentano di intensita’ nel tempo per alterazione dell’epitelio pigmentato retinico. L’esame ICG mostra numerose aree ipofluorescenti al polo posteriore con aspetto a “peau  d’orange”  ed evidenzia una neovascolarizzazione sottoretinica. L’esame OCTmostra una piccola falda di fluido sottoretinico sottoretinico in regione subfoveale. Conclusioni: Strie angioidi complicate in OO da neovascolarizzazione sottoretinica attiva. Si consiglia iniezione intravitreale di ANTI-VEGF in OO.
translation: Both Eyes: Angioid streaks. Right Eye: In the macular region, there are irregular hypo-hyperfluorescent areas that do not increase in intensity over time due to alterations in the retinal pigment epithelium. The ICG exam shows numerous hypofluorescent areas in the posterior pole with a "peau d'orange" appearance, and in the temporal sector of the posterior pole, there is a hypocyanscent area that remains unchanged over time, consistent with a choroidal nevus, also confirmed by OCTscans. The OCTexam reveals a small pocket of subretinal fluid in the subfoveal region. Left Eye: In the macular region, there are irregular hypo-hyperfluorescent areas that do not increase in intensity over time due to alterations in the retinal pigment epithelium. The ICG exam shows numerous hypofluorescent areas in the posterior pole with a "peau d'orange" appearance and highlights subretinal neovascularization. The OCTexam shows a small pocket of subretinal fluid in the subfoveal region. Conclusions: Angioid streaks complicated in both eyes by active subretinal neovascularization. Intravitreal injection of ANTI-VEGF is recommended in both eyes.

report: OD: Esame angiografico nella norma. L’esame OCTevidenzia profilo e spessore retinico nella norma. OS: Inferiormente all’arcata vascolare temporale inferiore si evidenzia un’area ipo-iperfuorescente che non si modifica nel tempo da esiti di melanoma della coroide trattato con brachiterapia. Si evidenzia occlusione di branca venosa, ramo di II ordine della vena temporale inferiore. Presenza di estese aree di non perfusione retinica nel settore inferiore. Lieve Aumento della permeabilità vasale al polo posteriore. L’esame OCTevidenzia conservato profilo foveolare con rare cisti intraretiniche e sollevamento dell’epitelio pigmentato retinico e della coriocapillare con ombreggiamento degli strati sottostanti in corrispondenza della lesione tumorale. Conclusioni: OS: Retinopatia da radiazione in esiti di melanoma della coroide trattato con brachiterapia. Si consiglia trattamento laser retinico in OS
translation: OD: The angiographic examination is normal. The OCTscan shows a normal retinal profile and thickness. OS: Below the inferior temporal vascular arcade, there is an area of hypo-hyperfluorescence that remains unchanged over time, consistent with the aftermath of choroidal melanoma treated with brachytherapy. There is an occlusion of a branch vein, a second-order branch of the inferior temporal vein. Extensive areas of retinal non-perfusion are present in the inferior sector. There is a slight increase in vascular permeability at the posterior pole. The OCTscan shows a preserved foveal profile with rare intraretinal cysts and elevation of the retinal pigment epithelium and choriocapillaris with shadowing of the underlying layers corresponding to the tumor lesion. Conclusions: OS: Radiation retinopathy as a result of choroidal melanoma treated with brachytherapy. Retinal laser treatment is recommended for OS.

report:
Quesito clinico: paziente con recente riscontro di ca retto

In corrispondenza del retto medio-basso a 3 cm dalla rima anale, si osserva la presenza di una lesione eteroplastica che si estende in direzione cranio-caudale per 4.5 cm circa e presenta spessore massimo di 1.7 cm con interessamento circonferenziale "a manicotto" e aspetto substenostante. Essa risulta caratterizzata da segnale disomogeneo nelle sequenze T2-pesate, con incremento dello stesso nelle sequenze pesate in diffusione (ADC 0.56).
Le anse intestinali a monte non sono dilatate.
In sede posteriore si osserva discontinuità del profilo parietale del viscere, con invasione del tessuto adiposo mesorettale pari a circa 8-9 mm.
Non si osservano sicuri segni di infiltrazione della fascia mesorettale (distanza lesione-MRF: 2.-3 mm), né di invasione vascolare extra-murale.
In sede mesorettale, si osserva la presenza di almeno 7 linfonodi a morfologia rotondeggiante e margini irregolari, di 4-5 mm, di sospetta natura secondaria.
Non si osservano ulteriori linfonodi loco-regionali con caratteristiche RM di sospetto.
Non si osservano falde di versamento liquido libero nello scavo pelvico. 

Staging MR: T3c, N2, MRF-, EMVI-.
translation:
Clinical Query: Patient with recent diagnosis of rectal cancer

At the level of the mid to lower rectum, 3 cm from the anal verge, there is an observed heteroplastic lesion extending craniocaudally for approximately 4.5 cm, with a maximum thickness of 1.7 cm, showing circumferential "sleeve-like" involvement and a substenotic appearance. The lesion is characterized by heterogeneous signal on T2-weighted sequences, with increased signal on diffusion-weighted sequences (ADC 0.56).
The upstream bowel loops are not dilated.
Posteriorly, there is a discontinuity in the bowel wall profile, with invasion into the mesorectal fat measuring approximately 8-9 mm.
There are no definite signs of mesorectal fascia infiltration (lesion-MRF distance: 2-3 mm), nor extramural vascular invasion.
Within the mesorectal area, there are at least 7 lymph nodes with a rounded morphology and irregular margins, measuring 4-5 mm, suspected to be secondary in nature.
No additional loco-regional lymph nodes with suspicious MRI characteristics are observed.
No free fluid collections are seen in the pelvic cavity.

Staging MR: T3c, N2, MRF-, EMVI-.

report: Gering nach dorsal dissoziierte distale Radiusfraktur mit fraglicher Beteiligung der Gelenkfläche. Ergänzende CT zur Beurteilung der Gelenkflächenbeteiligung empfohlen.
translation: Minimally displaced distal radius fracture with questionable involvement of the articular surface. A supplementary CT scan is recommended to assess the involvement of the articular surface.

report: Nicht dissoziierte distale Radiusfraktur rechts, keine Beteiligung der Gelenkfläche. Erhalten Artikulation im Handgelenk.
translation: Non-displaced distal radius fracture on the right, with no involvement of the joint surface. The wrist joint articulation is preserved.

report: Keine freie Flüssigkeit im Recessus splenorenalis. Keine freie Flüssigkeit im Recessus hepatorenalis. Kein Perikarderguss. Keine freie Flüssigkeit im Douglasraum. Insgesamt somit unauffälliger FAST.
translation: No free fluid in the splenorenal recess. No free fluid in the hepatorenal recess. No pericardial effusion. No free fluid in the pouch of Douglas. Overall, an unremarkable FAST exam.

report:
Bekannte, konstante tuberkulöse Spondylodiszitis im Segment Lendenwirbelkörper 1/2 mit Destruktion der Wirbelkörper. Umgebende Abszedierung links regredient bei einliegender perkutaner Drainage von dorsal, aktuell ca. 3 x 3 cm Restverhalt. Geringe umgebende Imbibierung des Fettgewebes sowie Auftreibung der paravertrebralen Muskulatur. 
Darüberhinaus konstante unauffällige Darstellung der übrigen Wirbelsäule sowie der miterfassten Oberbauchorgane und basalen Lungenanteile.
translation: Known, persistent tuberculous spondylodiscitis at the L1/2 segment with destruction of the vertebral bodies. Surrounding abscess on the left is regressing with a percutaneous drainage in place from the dorsal side, currently approximately 3 x 3 cm residual. Mild surrounding infiltration of the adipose tissue and swelling of the paravertebral musculature. Additionally, the rest of the spine, as well as the included upper abdominal organs and basal lung sections, appear consistently unremarkable.

report:
Harnstau:
Befund / Beurteilung:
 
Rechte Niere 10.5 x 4 cm; linke Niere 11 x 4 cm messend. Parenchymsaum bds. nicht verschmälert.
Kein Harnstau. Sonographisch kein Konkrementnachweis.
Urinjet über beiden Ureterostien einsehbar.
Harnblase regelrecht konfiguriert und gut gefüllt.
translation:
Hydronephrosis:  
Findings / Assessment:

The right kidney measures 10.5 x 4 cm; the left kidney measures 11 x 4 cm. The parenchymal margins on both sides are not thinned.  
No hydronephrosis. Sonographically, no evidence of calculi.  
Urine jets visible over both ureteral orifices.  
The urinary bladder is normally configured and well-filled.

report:
Befund:
 
 
Herz nicht vergrößert und unauffällig konfiguriert. Keine Mediastinalverbreiterung. Hili frei.
Unauffällige zentrale und periphere Lungengefäßzeichnung. Keine Flüssigkeitseinlagerungen.
Kleiner Pleuraerguss links, kein Erguss rechts. Kein Nachweis eines Pneumothorax. Kein Mediastinalshift.
Keine floriden Infiltrate oder raumfordernden Prozesse. Keine (post-)spezifischen Veränderungen.
Knöcherner Thorax ohne pathologischen Befund.
Weichteilmantel unauffällig.
 
Beurteilung:
Dezenter Randwinkelerguss rechts
translation:
Findings:

The heart is not enlarged and has a normal configuration. No widening of the mediastinum. Hila are clear. 
Normal appearance of central and peripheral pulmonary vasculature. No fluid accumulation. 
Small pleural effusion on the left, no effusion on the right. No evidence of pneumothorax. No mediastinal shift. 
No active infiltrates or space-occupying lesions. No (post-)specific changes. 
Bony thorax shows no pathological findings. 
Soft tissue envelope is unremarkable.

Impression:

Subtle costophrenic angle effusion on the right.

report:
Befund:
Kein Nachweis pathologisch vergrößerter Lymphknoten zervikal, supra- und infraklavikulär, axillär und retroperitoneal. Ein etwa 2 x 0.5 cm messender Lymphknoten rechts inguinal, mit Druckschmerz und zentral betonter Vaskularisierung.  
 
Beurteilung:
Prominenter a.e. entzündlicher  Lymphknoten rechts inguinal.
translation:
Findings:
No evidence of pathologically enlarged lymph nodes in the cervical, supra- and infraclavicular, axillary, and retroperitoneal regions. A lymph node measuring approximately 2 x 0.5 cm is noted in the right inguinal area, with tenderness and centrally accentuated vascularization.

Conclusion:
Prominent lymph node in the right inguinal region, likely inflammatory in nature.

No evidence of pathologically enlarged lymph nodes in the cervical, supra- and infraclavicular, axillary, and retroperitoneal regions. A lymph node measuring approximately 2 x 0.5 cm is noted in the right inguinal area, with tenderness and centrally accentuated vascularization.

Conclusion:
No prominent lymph node in the right inguinal region, likely inflammatory in nature.

Prominenter a.e. entzündlicher  Lymphknoten rechts cervikal.
translation:
Findings: 
No evidence of pathologically enlarged lymph nodes in the supraclavicular, infraclavicular, axillary, inguinal, and retroperitoneal regions. A lymph node measuring approximately 2.5 x 0.6 cm is noted on the right side of the neck, which is tender to pressure and shows central vascularization.

Conclusion: 
Prominent lymph node on the right side of the neck, likely inflammatory in nature.

report: Non versamento pleurico né pericardico. In corrispondenza del lobo superiore sinistro presenza di almeno quattro formazioni nodulari solide a margini sfumati a distribuzione prevalentemente submantellare, la maggiore delle quali al segmento apico-dorsale di dimensione trasversa massima di circa 15 mm, da riferire in prima ipotesi a localizzazioni secondarie di malattia. Lievi segni di disventilazione alle piramidi basali.   Visibilità di alcuni linfonodi di asse corto < 10 mm a livello ilo-mediastinico. Regolare il rivestimento pleurico. Cuore e grossi vasi nei limiti. Non versamento pericardico.
translation: No pleural or pericardial effusion. In the left upper lobe, there are at least four solid nodular formations with indistinct margins, predominantly subpleural in distribution. The largest is located in the apico-dorsal segment with a maximum transverse dimension of approximately 15 mm, likely representing secondary disease sites. Mild signs of hypoventilation at the basal pyramids. Some lymph nodes with a short axis < 10 mm are visible at the hilar-mediastinal level. The pleural lining is normal. Heart and major vessels are within normal limits. No pericardial effusion.

report: Indicazione: possibile angioma epatico, caratterizzazione mediante RM. Esame eseguito prima e dopo somministrazione di MdC paramagnetico epatospecifico (Multihance). Fegato con modesta prevalenza lobo destro, presenta modeste note di steatosi diffusa. Ad S6 si conferma la presenza di piccola lesione nodulare con diametro di 15 mm, che appare ipervascolare senza wash-out. In fase epato-biliare appare iso-iperintensa, con significato di FNH. Non si riconoscono ulteriori significative lesioni focali in ambito epatico. Come di norma la colecisti, esente da calcoli. Non dilatazione delle vie biliari intra ed extraepatiche. Pervia la vena porta. La milza è nei limiti, il pancreas presenta regolare morfologia ed intensità di segnale. Non dilatazione dotto di Wirsung. Come di norma i surreni ed i reni. Regolari i grossi vasi retroperitoneali. Non si riconoscono significative linfoadenopatie. Non versamento libero in addome. Conclusioni: piccola FNH di 15 mm ad S6. Referto di benignità.
translation: Indication: Possible hepatic hemangioma, characterization via MRI. Examination performed before and after administration of hepatospecific paramagnetic contrast agent (Multihance). The liver, predominantly in the right lobe, shows mild signs of diffuse steatosis. In segment 6, a small nodular lesion measuring 15 mm is confirmed, appearing hypervascular without wash-out. In the hepatobiliary phase, it appears iso-hyperintense, indicative of FNH. No other significant focal lesions are identified in the liver. The gallbladder is normal, free of stones. No dilation of the intrahepatic and extrahepatic bile ducts. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits, and the pancreas shows regular morphology and signal intensity. No dilation of the Wirsung duct. The adrenal glands and kidneys are normal. The major retroperitoneal vessels are regular. No significant lymphadenopathy is noted. No free fluid in the abdomen. Conclusions: Small FNH of 15 mm in segment 6. Benign report.

report: Indicazione: paziente con steatoepatite e HBV acuta. Controllo di lesione al s4. Esame eseguito prima e dopo somministrazione MdC paramagnetico epatospecifico (Multihance), e confrontato con indagini precedenti, l'ultima una TC . Fegato ingrandito con modeste note di steatosi diffusa. Apprezzabile discreta ipertrofia del lobo di sinistra e del lobo caudato in rapporto ad epatopatia cronica. Ad S4 si riconosce lesione nodulare di 20 mm caratterizzata da impregnazione periferica con risparmio di piccola area centrale che si impregna solo tardivamente. La lesione appare caratterizzata da restrizione della diffusione, in crescita rispetto all'indagine precedente ed appare fortemente sospetta (colangiocarcinoma su HBV? Indispensabile biopsia). Non si riconoscono ulteriori significative lesioni in ambito epatico. Come di norma la colecisti e le vie biliari intra ed extraepatiche. Pervia laena porta. La milza è nei limiti. Il pancreas è regolare. Non dilatazione del dotto di Wirsung. Come di norma i surreni ed i reni. Regolari i grossi vasi retroperitoneali. Non versamento libero in addome. Conclusioni: lesione sospetta al IV segmento con caratteristiche suggestive per colangio carcinoma in infezione da HBV. Indispensabile biopsia.
translation: Indication: Patient with steatohepatitis and acute HBV. Follow-up of lesion in segment 4. Exam performed before and after administration of hepatospecific paramagnetic contrast agent (Multihance), and compared with previous studies, the latest being a CT scan. The liver is enlarged with mild diffuse steatosis. There is noticeable moderate hypertrophy of the left lobe and caudate lobe in relation to chronic liver disease. In segment 4, a 20 mm nodular lesion is identified, characterized by peripheral enhancement with sparing of a small central area that only enhances in the delayed phase. The lesion shows diffusion restriction, has grown compared to the previous study, and appears highly suspicious (cholangiocarcinoma on HBV? Biopsy is essential). No other significant hepatic lesions are identified. The gallbladder and intra- and extrahepatic bile ducts are normal. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits. The pancreas is normal. No dilation of the Wirsung duct. The adrenal glands and kidneys are normal. The major retroperitoneal vessels are normal. No free fluid in the abdomen. Conclusions: Suspicious lesion in segment IV with features suggestive of cholangiocarcinoma in the context of HBV infection. Biopsy is essential.

report: Indicazione: rivalutazione colangite sclerosante IgG4-relata in Paziente con storia di RCU e pregressa colectomia, con concomitante pouchite refrattaria agli antibiotici in attuale terapia con Vedolizumab. Esame eseguito prima e dopo somministrazione di 9 ml di MdC paramagnetico epatospecifico (Primovist), confrontato con precedente RM. Fegato nei limiti morfovolumetrici con regolare intensità di segnale. Si riconoscono multiple immagini iperintense lungo il decorso delle vie biliari, compatibili con calcoli biliari, evoluzione della colangite sclerosante segnalata in anamnesi in progressione rispetto al controllo precedente. In fase dinamica a livello periferico in sede peri duttale si riconoscono focolai di enhancement parenchimale in quadro suggestivo per lieve colangite post-ostruttiva, ridotte rispetto al precedente controllo. Non evidenza di lesioni focali sospette. In fase epato-biliare si apprezzano alcuni focolai periferici triangolari di ridotto enhancement compatibili con lieve evoluzione fibrotica. Le vie biliari intraepatiche presentano multipli aspetti stenotici, sia al lobo destro che al lobo di sinistra da riferirsi alla malattia primitiva. Anche il coledoco a livello pancreatico presenta piccola stenosi concentrica, da riferirsi a localizzazione di malattia. Pervia la vena porta. Milza nei limiti. Il pancreas è regolare. Non dilatazione del dotto di Wirsung. Reni e surreni regolari. Regolari i grossi vasi retroperitoneali. Multiple linfoadenopatie reattive sono apprezzabili in corrispondenza dell'ilo epatico, tripode celiaco ed in sede periaortica sostanzialmente stabili rispetto al precedente controllo. Non versamento libero in addome. Conclusioni: quadro di colangite sclerosante con calcolosi biliare e multiple stenosi biliari, in modesta progressione rispetto al precedente controllo.
translation: Indication: Re-evaluation of IgG4-related sclerosing cholangitis in a patient with a history of ulcerative colitis and previous colectomy, with concurrent pouchitis refractory to antibiotics, currently on Vedolizumab therapy. Examination performed before and after administration of 9 ml of hepatospecific paramagnetic contrast agent (Primovist), compared with previous MRI. The liver is within normal morpho-volumetric limits with regular signal intensity. Multiple hyperintense images are observed along the biliary tract, compatible with gallstones, indicating progression of the sclerosing cholangitis noted in the medical history compared to the previous examination. In the dynamic phase, peripheral peri-ductal areas show parenchymal enhancement suggestive of mild post-obstructive cholangitis, reduced compared to the previous examination. No evidence of suspicious focal lesions. In the hepatobiliary phase, some peripheral triangular areas of reduced enhancement are noted, compatible with mild fibrotic evolution. The intrahepatic bile ducts exhibit multiple stenotic features in both the right and left lobes, attributable to the primary disease. The common bile duct at the pancreatic level also shows a small concentric stenosis, attributable to disease localization. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits. The pancreas is normal. No dilation of the Wirsung duct. Kidneys and adrenal glands are normal. The major retroperitoneal vessels are normal. Multiple reactive lymphadenopathies are noted at the hepatic hilum, celiac trunk, and periaortic region, essentially stable compared to the previous examination. No free fluid in the abdomen. Conclusions: Picture of sclerosing cholangitis with gallstone disease and multiple biliary strictures, with modest progression compared to the previous examination.

No evidence of suspicious focal lesions. In the hepatobiliary phase, some peripheral triangular areas of reduced enhancement are noted, compatible with mild fibrotic evolution. The intrahepatic bile ducts exhibit multiple stenotic features in both the right and left lobes, attributable to the primary disease. The common bile duct at the pancreatic level also shows a small concentric stenosis, attributable to disease localization. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits. The pancreas is normal. No dilation of the Wirsung duct. Kidneys and adrenal glands are normal. The major retroperitoneal vessels are normal. Multiple reactive lymphadenopathies are noted at the hepatic hilum, celiac trunk, and periaortic region, essentially stable compared to the previous examination. No free fluid in the abdomen. Conclusions: Picture of sclerosing cholangitis without gallstone disease and multiple biliary strictures, with modest progression compared to the previous examination.

report: Indicazione: Colecistite acuta. Dilatazione delle vie billiari extra epatiche (Litiasi coledocica?) con ittero colestastico. Ancora evidente l'importante difetto di riempimento trombotico a carico dell'arteria polmonare destra segnalato nella precedente TC. Fegato di dimensioni nei limiti, con regolare intensità di segnale, senza evidenza di lesioni focali. Colecisti distesa, a pareti non ispessite, multilitiasica. Presenta impregnazione tradiva di mdc in rapporto a flogosi. Evidenza di ectasia del coledoco di dmax di circa 14mm, con evidenza di alcune formazioni litiasiche endoluminali in prossimità dello sbocco papillare. Non dilatate le vie biliari intraepatiche. Vena porta di calibro regolare, pervia. Pancreas di dimensioni ridotte, ad involuzione fibroadiposa. Come di norma la milza e i surreni.Reni di dimensioni lievemente ridotte, con alcune millimetriche cisti corticali e parapieliche bilateralmente. Non evidenti linfoadenopatie e/o linfoadenomegalie. Conclusioni: quadro di colecistite con calcolosi ed alcuni piccoli calcoli a carico del coledoco preterminale.
translation: Indication: Acute cholecystitis. Dilation of the extrahepatic bile ducts (Choledocholithiasis?) with cholestatic jaundice. The significant thrombotic filling defect in the right pulmonary artery noted in the previous CT is still evident. The liver is within normal size limits, with normal signal intensity and no evidence of focal lesions. The gallbladder is distended, with non-thickened walls, and contains multiple stones. There is delayed contrast enhancement related to inflammation. Evidence of ectasia of the common bile duct with a maximum diameter of approximately 14mm, with some endoluminal stone formations near the papillary outlet. The intrahepatic bile ducts are not dilated. The portal vein is of regular caliber and patent. The pancreas is reduced in size, with fibroadipose involution. The spleen and adrenal glands are normal. The kidneys are slightly reduced in size, with some small cortical and parapelvic cysts bilaterally. No evident lymphadenopathy or lymphadenomegaly. Conclusions: Findings consistent with cholecystitis with cholelithiasis and some small stones in the preterminal common bile duct.

report: Indicazione: valutazione di lesione del corpo del pancreas segnalata ad indagine TC eseguita in altra sede. Esame eseguito prima e dopo somministrazione di MdC paramagnetico (Multihance). Fegato nei limiti morfovolumetrici con regolare intensità di segnale. Nel suo contesto non si riconoscono significative lesioni focali. Esiti di colecistectomia. Non dilatazione delle vie biliari intra ed extraepatiche. Pervia la vena porta. La milza è nei limiti. Il pancreas presenta discreta dilatazione del dotto di Wirsung a livello del corpo-coda. Al passaggio corpo-coda il Wirsung  si interrompe bruscamente per un tratto di circa 12 mm ove si riconosce focolaio di ipointensità di segnale dopo somministrazione MdC con maggior asse di 2 cm che posteriormente supera il profilo pancreatico con modesta infiltrazione del grasso periviscerale. La vena splenica tuttavia appare regolarmente pervia. Come di norma i grossi vasi peripancreatici. Regolari i surreni ed i reni. Non si riconoscono significative adenopatie in sede peripancreatica e para-aortica. Conclusioni: quanto segnalato a livello del passaggio corpo-coda del pancreas è fortemente sospetto per neoformazione primitiva pancreatica con modesto impegno della lamina posteriore del pancreas. Non infiltrazione dei vasi pelvici pancreatici. Non significative adenopatie.
translation: Indication: Evaluation of a pancreatic body lesion reported on a CT scan performed at another facility. Examination conducted before and after administration of paramagnetic contrast agent (Multihance). The liver is within normal morpho-volumetric limits with normal signal intensity. No significant focal lesions are identified. Post-cholecystectomy status. No dilation of the intrahepatic and extrahepatic bile ducts. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits. The pancreas shows moderate dilation of the Wirsung duct at the body-tail level. At the body-tail junction, the Wirsung duct abruptly terminates over a segment of approximately 12 mm, where a focus of hypointensity is noted after contrast administration, with a major axis of 2 cm that extends posteriorly beyond the pancreatic profile with mild infiltration of the perivisceral fat. However, the splenic vein appears to be patent. The major peripancreatic vessels are normal. The adrenal glands and kidneys are normal. No significant lymphadenopathy is identified in the peripancreatic and para-aortic regions. Conclusions: The findings at the body-tail junction of the pancreas are highly suspicious for a primary pancreatic neoplasm with mild involvement of the posterior pancreatic lamina. No infiltration of the pancreatic pelvic vessels. No significant lymphadenopathy.

report: Indicazione all'indagine: stadiazione in paziente con neoplasia cefalo-pancreatica. Indagine RM acquisita con scansioni assiali e coronali mediante sequenze pesate in T2, DWI e T1, queste ultime ripetute anche dopo saturazione selettiva del segnale relativo al tessuto adiposo e infusione di MdC paramagnetico e.v. (Gd BOPTA) e completata con sequenza MR.Fegato di regolari dimensioni; nel suo contesto ad entrambi i lobi sono presenti numerose lesioni secondarie con dimensioni variabili tra pochi millimetri e circa 23 mm. Come di norma milza, surreni e reni. Voluminosa formazione espansiva cefalopabcreatica di circa 7,5 x 4,5 cm infiltra la II e la III porzione duodenali, la confluenza spleno- mesenterico- portale, il retroperitoneo (ove giunge a ridosso della vena cava inferiore e del peduncolo vascolare renale destro) e determina ectasia delle vie biliari extraepatiche e del dotto pancreatico principale a monte, con consensuali note di pancreatite cronica ostruttiva. Coesistono micronoduli patologici retroperitoneali e adenopatie in regione celiaca con dimensioni fino a 12 x 6 mm. Sovradistesa la camera gastrica verosimilmente a causa di stenosi duodenale. Sovradistesa la colecisti, contiene fango biliare. Non significativo versamento ascitico peri epato-splenico. Conclusioni: voluminosa lesione cefalo-pancreatica infiltra il duodeno, il retriperitoneo e la confluenza spleno-mesenterico-portale e determina ectasia della via biliare extraepatica e del dotto pancreatico principale a monte. Coesistono micronoduli retroperitoneali, adenopatie in regione celiaca e lesioni secondarie epatiche
translation: Indication for the examination: staging in a patient with cephalopancreatic neoplasm. MRI examination acquired with axial and coronal scans using T2-weighted, DWI, and T1 sequences, the latter also repeated after selective fat signal saturation and intravenous infusion of paramagnetic contrast agent (Gd BOPTA), completed with MR sequence. The liver is of regular size; within it, numerous secondary lesions are present in both lobes, ranging in size from a few millimeters to approximately 23 mm. The spleen, adrenal glands, and kidneys are unremarkable. A large cephalopancreatic mass measuring approximately 7.5 x 4.5 cm infiltrates the second and third portions of the duodenum, the spleno-mesenteric-portal confluence, and the retroperitoneum (where it approaches the inferior vena cava and the right renal vascular pedicle), causing ectasia of the extrahepatic bile ducts and the main pancreatic duct upstream, with associated signs of obstructive chronic pancreatitis. Pathological retroperitoneal micronodules and lymphadenopathy in the celiac region are present, measuring up to 12 x 6 mm. The gastric chamber is overdistended, likely due to duodenal stenosis. The gallbladder is overdistended and contains biliary sludge. No significant perihepatic or perisplenic ascitic fluid. Conclusions: a large cephalopancreatic lesion infiltrates the duodenum, retroperitoneum, and spleno-mesenteric-portal confluence, causing ectasia of the extrahepatic bile duct and the main pancreatic duct upstream. Coexisting retroperitoneal micronodules, lymphadenopathy in the celiac region, and secondary liver lesions are present.

report: Indicazione: paziente con epatopatia cronica cirrotica, con pregressi interventi di ablazione di HCC. All'indagine TC precedente segnalata lesione solida ipervascolare alla coda del pancreas, verosimile PNEN. Esame eseguito prima e dopo somministrazione di MdC paramagnetico. Al fegato tuttora apprezzabili le alterazioni morfologiche di tipo cirrotico, con esiti di ablasione al s4. A tale livello non si riconoscono immagini riferibili a recidiva di malattia. Non si apprezzano ulteriori significative lesioni focali in ambito epatico. Esiti di colecistectomia; non dilatazione delle vie biliari intra ed extraepatiche. Pervia la vena porta. La milza è nei limiti. Pancreas con infiltrazione adiposa diffusa. Alla coda del pancreas si apprezza piccolo focolaio ipervasacolare con restrizione della diffusione all'altezza del nodulo ipervascolare segnalato all'indagine TC, riferibile a PNEN. Appare stabile rispetto al precedente controllo. Il dotto di Wirsung ha calibro regolare. Surreni e reni regolari. Regolari i grossi vasi retroperitoneali, non si riconoscono significative linfoadenopatie. Non versamento libero. Conclusioni: quadro stabile
translation: Indication: Patient with chronic cirrhotic liver disease, with previous HCC ablation procedures. The prior CT scan reported a hypervascular solid lesion in the tail of the pancreas, likely a pancreatic neuroendocrine neoplasm (PNEN). Examination performed before and after administration of paramagnetic contrast agent. The liver still shows morphological changes consistent with cirrhosis, with ablation results at segment 4. No images suggestive of disease recurrence are identified at this level. No other significant focal lesions are observed in the liver. Post-cholecystectomy status; no dilation of intrahepatic and extrahepatic bile ducts. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits. The pancreas shows diffuse fatty infiltration. In the tail of the pancreas, a small hypervascular focus with diffusion restriction is noted at the site of the hypervascular nodule reported in the CT scan, consistent with PNEN. It appears stable compared to the previous examination. The Wirsung duct has a regular caliber. Adrenals and kidneys are normal. The major retroperitoneal vessels are normal, with no significant lymphadenopathy identified. No free fluid. Conclusions: Stable findings.

Post-cholecystectomy status; no dilation of intrahepatic and extrahepatic bile ducts. The portal vein is patent. The spleen is within normal limits. The pancreas shows diffuse fatty infiltration. In the tail of the pancreas, a small hypervascular focus with diffusion restriction is noted at the site of the hypervascular nodule reported in the CT scan, consistent with PNEN. It appears stable compared to the previous examination. The Wirsung duct has a regular caliber. Adrenals and kidneys are normal. The major retroperitoneal vessels are normal, with no significant lymphadenopathy identified. No free fluid. Conclusions: Stable findings.
